0.description: 描边的宽度不随 rem 的变化而变化。描边将始终为固定指数

rem.description:
size.rem 是所有与尺寸相关的标记（size、space、padding 等）的基本比例。
默认值为 1rem=16px，改变它，即改变所有尺寸相关内容

fontRem.description:
fontRem 为所有文字的 rem 基准。
我将 size 和 fontSize 的 rem 分开处理，可以更为灵活的配置 Tokens。

fontBase.description: rem 的固定值的方案无法保障所有的数值为整。作为对齐前端的设计方案无法两者兼得

xs.description: 反直觉的是，xs 可以作为 head 的行高

s.description: 默认行高，也可以作为行高的优秀选择

m.description: 非正文的行高，可能是 tooltips。

default.description: Only two colors needed when color modifiers are used on component level.

bg.description: The old-school way without color modifiers on component level.

darker.description: Your primary and secondary brand colors are not necessarily your primary and secondary interaction colors, that's why I added those tokens.

none.description: This is basically your page margin (in breakpoints-speak).
This is basically your page gutter (in breakpoints-speak).

m.description: m is the size of body text which is typically the same size as h6.

ml.description: ml is large body text which is typically the same size as h5.

xxxl.description: xxxl is your h1, but don't tell anyone, we want to speak in tokens not in HTML markup.

scale.description: I added a scale here to be able to change the roundness of all border-radiuses simultaneously. That can be a very nice mechanism for several other tokens.
